metadata.topic_title: RSA Key Size Selection for Signatures

active_learning.discussion_prompt: Debate the misconception 'Larger RSA keys are always better': In groups, discuss performance trade-offs (e.g., slower verification with 3072-bit keys) and when alternatives like ECDSA might be preferable. Cite NIST SP 800-57 Rev. 5 and address quantum risks.
